name: Oh! Mayday!
description:
Oh! Mayday! is a shoot'em up in which you have to catch all the enemies' bullets so your protective bubble will activate and damage your foes.  It's payback time!

----------------------------------------------------------

CONCEPT:

In Oh! Mayday! your ship is capable of absorbing the enemies' bullets to fill its energy bar and damage the enemies around it. It speed, maneuverability and shield size depends on this gauge. 

Energy: Your energy fills a little every time you catch an enemy's bullet. If your energy gauge depletes, your ship will enter a stall, and will fall to the bottom of the screen. That's death.

Enemy Ships: If the enemies touch your ship, you'll explode. That's death too.

Shield Bubble: Your shield will activate when you catch an enemy's bullet for a short period of time. Use that time to hit your enemies with your big bubble of death.

 Points: Killing enemies will award you points. One of the benefits of being a high horse pacifist!

----------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

WASD: for movement. 

Spacebar: To start/restart the game once you have died.

--------------------------------------------------------

TIPS:

-Moving will spend your gauge faster. Save your energy!

-The enemies' bullets can't hurt you. But their ships can. Avoid contact!

-Try to calculate your enemies's bullet and your enemies ship trajectory for better results. Math! Yay!
